titleStmt.title: XI choice sermons preached upon severall occasions. With a catechisme expounding the grounds and principles of Christian religion. By William Gay B.D. rector of Buckland.
titleStmt.author: Gay, William, Rector of Buckland.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Humphrey Moseley, and are to be sold at his shop at the Princes Armes in St. Pauls Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: Annotation on Thomason copy: "February. 24 1654"; the second 5 in the imprint date has been crossed out.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
